item.title: Can an AI Agent Safely Run a Government? Existence of Probably Approximately Aligned Policies
item.description: This paper introduces a novel quantitative definition of AI alignment for social decision-making, proposing probably approximately aligned policies and a method to safeguard any autonomous agent’s act…

item.title: Neural Model Checking
item.description: Neural networks revolutionize hardware model checking by generating formal proof certificates, outperforming state-of-the-art techniques in speed and scalability.

item.title: Provably Safe Neural Network Controllers via Differential Dynamic Logic
item.description: Verifiably safe AI controllers are created via a novel framework, VerSAILLE, which uses differential dynamic logic and open-loop NN verification to prove safety for unbounded time horizons.

item.title: Refusal in Language Models Is Mediated by a Single Direction
item.description: LLM refusal is surprisingly mediated by a single, easily manipulated direction in the model’s activation space.

item.title: Rule Based Rewards for Language Model Safety
item.description: Rule-Based Rewards (RBRs) enhance LLM safety by using AI feedback and a few-shot prompt-based approach, achieving higher safety-behavior accuracy with less human annotation than existing methods.

item.title: SEEV: Synthesis with Efficient Exact Verification for ReLU Neural Barrier Functions

item.title: Stepwise Alignment for Constrained Language Model Policy Optimization
item.description: Stepwise Alignment for Constrained Policy Optimization (SACPO) efficiently aligns LLMs with human values, prioritizing both helpfulness and harmlessness via a novel stepwise approach.

item.title: Uncovering, Explaining, and Mitigating the Superficial Safety of Backdoor Defense

item.title: Unelicitable Backdoors via Cryptographic Transformer Circuits
item.description: Researchers unveil unelicitable backdoors in language models, using cryptographic transformer circuits, defying conventional detection methods and raising crucial AI safety concerns.
